Open Feature Enhancement ProposalsÂ¶

This repository serves as a focal point for research and experimental work. It also enables the creation of discussions, proposals and ideation through issues.

We use OFEP: Open Feature Enhancement proposals, which comes from the lineage of PEP much like the Kubernetes project uses KEP

Please follow the OFEP Template when creating a pull request for a new OFEP document.
